title: A select second husband for Sir Thomas Ouerburie's wife, now a matchlesse widow
author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede and Barnard Allsopp, for Iohn Marriott: and are to be sold at his shop at the white Flower-de-luce, neere Fetter Lane end in Fleetstreete,
notes: An imitation of: Overbury, Sir Thomas.  A wife, now a widowe.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
